Class Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.miracosta.cs113.Term
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Term>

    public class Term
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Term>, java.lang.Cloneable
    Term.java : represents a single term in the polynomial
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emiliia Dyrenkova
